title: kaalaharaNa
sahitya:
kAlaharaNa mElarA harE sItArAma












anupallavi 






kAlaharaNa mEla suguNa jAla karuNAlavAla







caraNam 1






cuTTi cuTTi pakSulella ceTTu vedaku rIti bhuvini puTTulEka nE n  padamula
baTTu konna nannu brOva

caraNam 2

poDavuna entADukonna bhUmini tyAgambu rIti kaDu vElpula nIvugAka evaru
nannu brOva

caraNam 3

dina dinamu tirigi tirigi dikkulEka sharanu jocci tanuvu dhanamu nIdEyaNTi
tyAgarAja vinuta rAma

caraNam 4

iSTa daivamA manObhISTa mIyalEka inka kastamA tyAgarAju kAmitArtha phala
mosanga
